item.title: Update: The Addon System Update
item.description: We just made our add-on system a LOT better than before! After 1 issue we encountered, we have done it!

item.title: Antenna
item.description: The antenna component is connected to a network port. If connected, You would be able to send data to other antenna’s wireless!

item.title: Audio
item.description: The Audio Module for the computer API! Structures AudioParameter Results for getParams Fields: default [ number ] The default value maximum [ number ] The maximum value minimum [ number ] The minimum value ParamsIncorrectTable Result for areParamsCorrect.

item.title: Base64
item.description: The Base64 Module for the computer API! Functions encode sm.scrapcomputers.base64.encode( data ) Converts a string to be Base64 encoded Arguments:

item.title: Bitstream
item.description: A BitStream Module that lets you make packet data (for example) Functions new sm.scrapcomputers.bitstream.new( data ) Creates a new BitStream Stream

item.title: BitStream
item.description: A Bitstream that is a stream of bits! (What did you expect!) Fields pos [ number ] The position in the string itself (Bit by Bit!

item.title: BitStream
item.description: A Bitstream that is a stream of bits! (What did you expect!) Fields pos [ number ] The position in the string itself (Bit by Bit!

item.title: Camera
item.description: The camera allows you to take screenshots or even render video from the world to your display! Our camera looks great while not even touching the raytracing.

item.title: Color
item.description: The Color Module for the computer API! Functions newSingluar sm.scrapcomputers.color.newSingluar( rgbNum ) Creates a new color from 1 value. Whatever rgbNum’s value has will be set on R, G, and B.

item.title: ComponentManager
item.description: This allows you to find connected components and create components! Functions sm.scrapcomputers.components.ToComponent( classData, dataType, shouldBeComponent ) Converts a class to a component class!
